quizDescription.text:
Note: Write your correct options with comma and space separated
Ex: a, b, d
c
a, c

questionText.text:
Match the following:
Which of the following values can be referred when the trigger runs on the given events.

_______means that the data used during the execution of a transaction cannot be used by a second transaction until the first one is completed.
a. Consistency
b. Isolation
c. Atomicity
d. Durability

Identify the characteristics of transactions
a. Atomicity
b. Durability
c. Isolation
d. All of the above

Which of the following data structures is not used for implementing Indexes.
a. B trees
b. B+ trees
c. Heaps
d. Hash tables

The statement that is executed automatically by the system as a side effect of the modification of the database is
a. trigger
b. Backup
c. Assertion
d. Recovery
